ygData.subject: Re: Description Thingy
ygData.msgSnippet: I learned from a guy on Veeshan yesterday that the trick to this is putting yourself in 3rd person view, click on yourself, then click on the black box and
ygData.messageBody:
I learned from a guy on Veeshan yesterday that the trick to this is putting
yourself in 3rd person view, click on yourself, then click on the black box
and type in it. I did it and it works like a charm.
----- Original Message -----
From: Daniel P. Sniderman <slide@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 9:48 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Description Thingy


> From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <slide@...>
>
> I don't recall having a place to enter it when creating my char - is it
> possible to set it via a slash command or something?
>
> Thanks
>
> Slyde of Xegony
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> ONElist: bringing the world together.
> http://www.onelist.com
> Join a new list today!
>
